ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name<>'Data Loader Profile', ISNEW(), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Contracted_Quote'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Identify Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Develop Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Closed - Cancelled by Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Closed - Withdrawn by Nokia'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Closed - Lost to Competitor'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Closed - Obsolete'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Completed') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote creation is not allowed at the current Opportunity Sales Phase. Quote creation can be done on open Opportunities from G3 - Create Offer until Completed.
